parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.56

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Eden Editor

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Return all [[Eden Editor: Connecting|connections]] currently present on an entity.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''get3DENConnections''' entity
</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> entity: [[Eden Entity]] or [[Eden ID]]
</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] in format:
<code>[[type1,to1], [type2, to2], ..., [typeN, toN]]</code>
* type: [[String]] - connection class from ''Cfg3DEN >> Connections''
* to: [[Eden Entity]] to which the connection leads to

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[get3DENConnections]] _trigger; <template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>Can return [["WaypointActivation",[B Alpha 4-5,0]]]</value></part></template></code>

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value>
[[add3DENConnection]]
[[remove3DENConnection]]
</value></part></template></root>
